mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It", "Let's Look at Square Dancing", "Overseas Dateline", "The Dancers' Walkthru", "Building Blocks for Callers", "A Caller Speaks Out", "Americana: Oh How He Lied", "Style Series: The Art of Adapting and Adjusting", "Ladies on the Square: "Do It Yourself" Sewing Sessions", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "12th Annual National Square Dance Convention", "The Caller of the Month: Dick Leger", "Paging the Roundancers: Lloyd and Ruby Bellamy", "Current Best Sellers: Record Sales Survey", and "Experimental Lab - Clover Leaf".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
